changes:
### UX Improvements 
- Added "Mimic Role" feature in the game settings. Now you decide which role the AI will pretend as.
- Added markdown syntax to this "Recent Changes" popup.
- Fixed text color in some places default to white on iOS devices.

### Initial Release
- Core game functionality
- Room creation and joining
- Question generation system
- Voting mechanism
- Results display
- Feedback system
